channel.title: Need suggestions, please help. ++REPPING
channel.description: Alright so basically im coding 'something' :P and ive got a 'door' thats surrounded by 'monsters'.. basically im coding dung and theres a door with guardians around em. In rs you must kill all the guardians to advance... well im not sure how to do this. So any suggestions for alternatives? Was thinking i COULD make it so u just have to kill 5 of em and then you can advance.. BUT they respawn so fast... Ik this possible because how else do people make Jad waves? Please help.

item.title: Need suggestions, please help. ++REPPING
item.dc:creator: @eballer48 eballer48
item.description:
@eballer48 wrote:

Alright so basically im coding ‘something’
and ive got a ‘door’ thats surrounded by ‘monsters’…
basically im coding dung and theres a door with guardians around em.
In rs you must kill all the guardians to advance… well im not sure how to do this.
So any suggestions for alternatives? Was thinking i COULD make it so u just have to kill
5 of em and then you can advance… BUT they respawn so fast… Ik this possible because how else do people make Jad waves? Please help.
